entries.s_f7565bbd: YES, I am sure. I want to continue my service.
entries.s_ebce22a9: NO, wait. Let me think a moment longer.
entries.s_ea196d60: I understand completely. Please come back and see me again if you change your mind.
entries.s_e3c4a3d5: No, do not reset my history. I will continue my service.
entries.s_deeb1462: If I reset your history, you will be able to go back and assist the Rebellion again as you have done in the past. But don't worry, you will be rewarded, and it will in no way reduce your standing in the rank of the Rebellion. Shall I reset your history?
entries.s_dc1c8663: YES, I am sure. Reset my service history.
entries.s_ce26bb71: We almost had a major catastrophe. The data disks that we use to keep all information on our allies that have performed services for our cause were stolen recently by an Imperial spy.
entries.s_b78f6030: Of course. Please come back and speak with me when you get a chance.
entries.s_b1f9a8ac: I'm sorry, I don't believe that you would have been in our databases. You don't need to speak with me.
entries.s_a76f22bf: What if I decide to reset my history?
entries.s_a45bb0ec: Well, it's up to me to recompile all the data that was on those disks, and I need to ask you a question or two regarding your employment history.
entries.s_9bc93d72: Yes, please reset my service history.
entries.s_93e226b7: NO, do not reset my history right now.
entries.s_866cf013: I see. What do you need me for?
entries.s_7666799: Very well, it is done. You may go speak with C-3PO when you are ready to begin your service again.
entries.s_710595f4: I've got to be going now.
entries.s_6e88ecc1: No, do not reset my history right now.
entries.s_5a47438c: Yes, I have already recorded your services. You do not need to speak with me.
entries.s_4b845961: Certainly. Simply return and speak with me again when you have made your decision.
entries.s_49d330ac: Alright, but remember that once you decide to continue, you cannot change your mind. Are you sure that you want to continue your service where you left off?
entries.s_48d3face: If I reset your history, you will be able to go back and assist the Rebellion again as you have done in the past. But don't worry, you will be rewarded again, and it will in no way reduce your standing in the rank of the Rebellion. Do you want me to reset your history?
entries.s_45b87508: Very well, it is done. You may continue your service to the Rebellion where you last left off.
entries.s_3d89228f: If you choose to continue from where you left off, you will simply return to the person which last gave you a job. That person will give you further instructions then. But remember that once you decide you cannot change your mind. Shall I reset your history?
entries.s_3c440d33: I understand completely. Take all the time you need.
entries.s_37420d49: Oh, good. I'm glad you stopped by, now I don't have to go looking for you. I need to ask you some questions if you have a moment to spare.
entries.s_3547d92c: I don't believe that you have performed any services for our cause in the past. You do not need to speak with me.
entries.s_3315cf03: Normally, those who have helped us so willingly in the past are not called on to do so again. However, if you wish, I can reset your service history with the Rebellion. Do you want me to reset your history?
entries.s_2eadaa06: If you like, I can reset your service history and you can assist the Rebellion again. Otherwise, you can continue your services where you left off. Remember that once you decide, you cannot change your mind. Do you want me to reset your history?
entries.s_2e18346d: I don't have time right now.
entries.s_19da6a67: We don't know who the spy was, but we were able to destroy his ship as it took off. He was killed in the explosion, but unfortunately the data disks he stole were destroyed as well.
entries.s_14693cf1: What if I decide to continue my service?
entries.s_11f0619b: Alright, but keep in mind that once I reset your history, it cannot be undone. Are you sure that you want me to reset your service history?
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (theme_park_record_keeper_rebel.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
